message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a great price of $11,500. I think it will be very valuable to you.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to spend a bit less.  How about $10,500?  It's still a great deal for both of us.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000? It's a very competitive price for this.
